description:
Situated just a few minutes from Bilpin village, down a quiet no through road, this botanical wonderland has that breath deep and unwind feel. The large well engineered home is private and spacious and has extra's like a sauna room with accompanying bathroom, wine cellar and grand loft style art studio / home office.

Surrounded by spectacular gardens, lush green lawns, stunning specimen trees and nature at its best.

Some of the features include;
• Slow combustion fireplace + reverse cycle air conditioning & gas outlets
• Chicken coop & several grass paddocks with shelters ideal for horses
• Orchard of apple, pear, lemon & persimmon, plus separate garden of blueberry and raspberry
• Substantial & fenced vegetable garden
• NBN connected & 5KW solar system
• Large shed with all the trimmings, a generator + separate tractor shed
• Original self-contained studio cottage, privately positioned away from the house with separate entrance
• Bore water and pump, 3 dams with water pumps & a well-designed irrigation system to allow water transfer with tap outlets throughout the property.
• Significant rainwater holding tanks for household use

This is one of those stand out properties that has so much to offer. With a good balance of structured gardens, open lawn space, cleared paddocks and natural bushland, it really does open the door to an array of uses.

If you are looking for something that could easily generate an income, the self-contained studio would make for a brilliant bnb or art / yoga studio. Alternatively, it is fabulous guest or extended family accommodation and has a stunning bush valley view from the back deck.

Absolutely everything has been thought of here and the infrastructure throughout this property is extensive. With the plantings, vegetable garden, orchard and chicken coup you could live an almost self-sufficient and organic life.

If you are in the market for a mountain beauty, contact Michael O'Hare to find out more or to arrange an inspection.
